name: LABIGO 10-in-1 Steam Mop with Detachable Handheld Steamer, 350ml Tank, 10s Heat-Up, 248°F Steam Cleaner, 3-Level Control and Swivel Head for Floors, Carpets, Tiles, BBQ grill Multi-Surface Clean White
short_description: 10-Second Heat-Up for Instant Cleaning: Say goodbye to long waits! LABIGO Steam Mop heats up in just 10 seconds, releasing powerful 248°F (120°C) steam to soften stubborn stains. Perfect for busy households, this feature ensures quick and efficient cleaning without the hassle— making it the ideal choice for effortlessly refreshing your home before Christmas gatherings and ready for the New Year.

One Tool for Every Surface: LABIGO 10-in-1 floor Steamer is more than just a floor cleaner—it’s your ultimate cleaning companion for carpets, tiles, windows, sofas, clothes,barbecue grill and more! With its carpet glider attachment, the steam cleaner glides smoothly over carpets, delivering deep cleaning. The easy-to-remove mop head allows you to detach and clean it effortlessly by simply stepping on the raised tab. From kitchen grease to bathroom grime, this steam mop does it all!

350ml Water Tank for Extended Cleaning Sessions: Equipped with a 350ml water tank, the LABIGO hardwood floor cleaner provides up to 12-15 minutes of continuous cleaning per fill. Cover more ground without frequent refills, making it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, and kitchens. Enjoy uninterrupted cleaning from start to finish!【Warning: Adding chemical cleaners may cause steam nozzle blockage.】

2-Level Steam Control for Customized Cleaning: LABIGO floor steamer offers 2 adjustable steam levels to suit all your cleaning needs. Use the low setting for daily cleaning and delicate surfaces, or switch to the high setting for deep cleaning and sanitizing tough stains. Whether it’s hardwood floors, tile grout, or carpets, this mop adapts to your needs while protecting your surfaces.

Safety and Convenience Designed for You: LABIGO steam cleaner for home prioritizes your safety with its auto shut-off feature, which alerts you with a 30-second beep and stops operation if the water tank runs dry. Plus, the 4-meter long power cord provides extended reach, allowing you to clean large areas without constantly switching outlets. Combined with its lightweight design and detachable handheld steamer, this mop makes cleaning safe, easy, and efficient.
product_details: Special Feature 10-in-1 Versatility, 2 Steam Levels, 248°F High-Temperature Steam, Quick Heat-Up, Safety Features

And this machine doesn’t just clean up after pets, it helps save them! BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

name: Schenley Steam Mop Cleaner Powerful - 15s Fast Heat-Up, Chemical-Free for Hardwood/Tile/Laminate & Floors/Walls, Washable Pads, 3 Modes for Carpet, Lightweight, Self-Standing, Sleek Design
short_description: [Effortless & Powerful Cleaning] Just a quick press and the steam is ready in 15 seconds. No waiting, no scrubbing, just effortless cleaning. Stubborn mess in the kitchen? Muddy paw prints at the door? Glide over them, and they disappear like magic with 248°F high-temperature steam, leaving your home fresh and inviting. Plus, with up to 37 minutes of continuous cleaning, you can tackle the whole house without stopping.

[Lightweight & Easy to Maneuver] Feels as light as a handbag at just 3 lbs, so you can lift and move it with ease. The 180° swivel head dances around furniture legs and slides under the couch, reaching those tricky spots without making you bend or struggle. Cleaning feels less like a chore and more like a smooth, graceful motion.

[Safe & Chemical-Free] No more worrying about little hands and paws touching chemical residues. This mop cleans with pure steam, lifting away germs while keeping your home safe and naturally fresh. Let the kids crawl, let your pets nap on the floor, and enjoy a home that is clean and worry-free with zero harsh chemicals.

[Self-Standing & Versatile] Need a break? Just let it stand on its own while you take a sip of coffee. Whether you are freshening up the living room, tackling bathroom tiles, or giving your carpets a quick refresh, this mop does it all with no extra tools and no hassle. The included carpet glider makes it easy to switch between hard floors and carpets in seconds.

[Easy Storage & Hassle-Free Use] No tangled cords and no bulky clutter. Just grab, glide, and tuck it away neatly when you are done. The 16 ft quick-release cord gives you plenty of reach, while the cord wrapper keeps everything tidy. The washable microfiber pads make cleaning effortless. Step on, peel off, and toss them in the wash, ready for next time.

[Chic, Delight-Ready & Quick to Set Up] Pretty, practical, and perfect for any home. The soft pink design adds a touch of elegance to cleaning, and setup is as easy as unboxing and clicking things into place. It comes with everything you need, and no extra tools are required. Whether it is a gift for a new home, a busy mom, or yourself, this is a little luxury that makes everyday life easier.
